name: Metal Sonic's Adventure (demo)
description:
this is currently a demo/wip. make sure to donate if you like this demo

also metal knucks isnt finished at all so you can play as normal knucks until i finish it lol

Up Arrow: Look up

Down Arrow: Crouch

Right Arrow: Go right

Left Arrow: Go left

Z button: Jump

P button: Pause

Special Moves:

Spindash: Jump several times while crouching.

Drop Dash(Sonic & Tails or Sonic Alone): When jumping stop pressing the jump button and then hold it.

Super Peel Out(Sonic & Tails or Sonic Alone): When looking up keep hold the jump button.

Flying(Tails Alone): After jumping press jump button again and again to get higher.
